level.heading: CLOSING OF EDUCATION AND TRAINING PROGRAMS (ยง 17-9330)

level.text: Each HHA program that voluntarily closes shall:
As early as reasonably possible, notify the Board, in writing, of the intended closing, stating the reason(s) for and planned date of the intended closing;
Continue the training program until the committed class scheduled for currently enrolled trainees is completed;
Notify the Board of the final closing date at least thirty (30) days before the final closing; and
Submit records to the Education Licensure Commission (ELC) for custody and retention, pursuant to the regulations of the ELC.
If the Board denies or withdraws approval of a training program, the institution shall:
Close the program on the date provided by the Board;
Submit to the Board a list of all program graduates and all current trainees transferred to approved programs and dates of transfer;
Comply with the requirements of all applicable rules and notify the Board that the requirements have been fulfilled; and
Submit student records to the ELC for custody and retention prior to closing date.
